label: productWeightLossInformationAmount
comment: A monetary value of the loss of weight of a product, such as fresh goods, stated for information purposes in this trade settlement line monetary summation.

rangeIncludes.comment: A number of monetary units specified in a currency where the unit of the currency is explicit or implied.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of monetary amount totals, specified at line level, for a trade settlement.
